parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description:
The filter conditions.

You can specify at most five filter conditions in each call.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **1** to **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the CEN instance belongs.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description:
The tags.

You can specify at most 20 tags in each call.
